CustomField.description: Defines the days that will be assessed for 'Frequency' breakpoints. When a day is selected, when 'Frequency' Breakpoint Overtime is reached (Breakpoint 2 and up), 'Frequency' Breakpoints will override all other breakpoints that apply to the day.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Defines the days that will be assessed for 'Frequency' breakpoints. When a day is selected, when 'Frequency' Breakpoint Overtime is reached (Breakpoint 2 and up), 'Frequency' Breakpoints will override all other breakpoints that apply to the day.
CustomField.label: Days 'Frequency' Breakpoints Apply
